name: Island Treasure Tracker
description:
Weekly Game Jam 189: Small Island
Very heavily Toad's Treasure Tracker inspired game, puzzle platformer where the objective is to collect all the gems!
Sadly just the one level for now! 

Thanks for playing!

If you're interested in following other projects I develop then follow me on Twitter.

https://twitter.com/Andrew_LGN
